article_title: iPhone 5s Supply, iPhone 5c Discounts, Beating Coke, Icahn's $150 Billion Plan, Apple Garage And Steve Jobs Remembered

article_metadata.description: Video Keeping you in the loop on some of the things that happened around Apple this week. iPhone re-supply. The iPhone 5s still might be rare, judging by the reaction whenever I pull out my new phone. But the supply situation for Apple’s new high-end smartphone seems to be improving. “Last year, [...]
